thread.title: Obama Restates His Frustration Over Gun Control
thread.title_full: Obama Restates His Frustration Over Gun Control

title: Obama Restates His Frustration Over Gun Control
text:
Obama Restates His Frustration Over Gun Control October 02, 2015 5:55 PM ET 
Audio for this story from All Things Considered will be available at approximately 7:00 p.m. ET. 
The president spoke again Friday, one day after the shooting at an Oregon community college that killed nine. NPR's Robert Siegel talks to correspondent Tamara Keith about the president's response.
